Detailed Description

Definition at line 14 of file ICalibration2d.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual const ICalibration2d* i2d::ICalibration2d::CreateCombinedCalibration ( const ICalibration2d &  calibration) const
pure virtual

Create new calibration being combination of this calibration and the second one.

Please note, that created object is owned by the caller and the caller must remove them.

Returns
new calibration object (owned by the caller) or NULL if creation was impossible.

Implemented in i2d::CAffineTransformation2d, i2d::CCalibration2dProxyComp, and i2d::CNoneCalibration2d.

virtual const imath::IUnitInfo* i2d::ICalibration2d::GetArgumentUnitInfo ( ) const
pure virtual

Get unit description of calibration input (transformation function argument).

Returns
unit description of function argument or NULL, if this information is unsupported.

Implemented in i2d::CAffineTransformation2d, i2d::CCalibration2dProxyComp, and i2d::CNoneCalibration2d.

Referenced by iqt2d::TShapeParamsGuiCompBase< Ui, Shape, ShapeModel >::GetUnitName().

virtual const imath::IUnitInfo* i2d::ICalibration2d::GetResultUnitInfo ( ) const
pure virtual

Get unit description of calibration output (transformation function result).

Returns
unit description of function result or NULL, if this information is unsupported.

Implemented in i2d::CAffineTransformation2d, i2d::CCalibration2dProxyComp, and i2d::CNoneCalibration2d.
